name: Throw My Stuff: 3D Indoor Game
description:
Aim, Throw & count stuff to trash bin at home
Have you ever been bored at home, when no one is there... you are all alone. Sitting idle and try throwing stuff tennis ball or beer can to a trash bin near your computer table and counting how many times you are successful?

This is the game for you... totally new look. So realistic, that you will think like... you are actually stuck at home alone and killing time.

Game Modes to Play:
There are three modes to play:
1- Living Room
2- Bedroom
3- Computer Table

How to Play:
- Select stuff from Tennis Ball, Beer Can, Wrapped Paper & Ping Pong Ball (Table Tennis Ball)
- Aim and swipe up your finger to throw selected stuff in to the Trash Bin
- Calculate the stuff before throwing as each stuff has its own weight & gravity
- There is a wind indicator indicating the direction & speed of the wind left or right
- Can change the stuff with in the Game Play
